item.title: Welcome to STAT 385 @ UIUC
item.description: Welcome Welcome to STAT 385: Statistics Programming Methods at UIUC. The following will serve as our course website. Please excuse the dust as it becomes sea worthy. Course Information Location: Siebel 1105 Time: Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday, 3:00 PM - 4:50 PM Generated using: # Load ggplot2 mapping extension library("ggmap") # Capture Image from Google Maps siebel_map = get_map(location = c(lon = -88.224735, lat = 40.113800), color = "color", source = "google", maptype = "satellite", zoom = 17) # Classroom location pt = data.
